alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hamilton, central Echols and central Clinch Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Needmore, or 13 miles east of Statenville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Hamilton, central Echols and central Clinch Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
